column1: Table 5.20: Cost estimate of minor irrigation-related proposals with locations

column3:
Requests balance concrete lining for (L-100 m) for 8-acre cultivation. Recommend 
1. To construct 300mm x300mm x100mm thick rectangular lining with sufficient earth filling for the reservation for 100m length. 
2. To plant single row of Areca nut seedling at 1m spacing and gaps filled with Vetiver grass and maintain for 3 months until roots are established.

Requests balance concrete lining for (L-60 m) for 12 acre cultivation. Recommend 1. To construct 300mm x300mm x100mm thick rectangular lining with sufficient earth filling for the reservation for 60m length. 2. To plant single row of Areca nut seedling @ 1m spacing and gaps filled with Vetiver grass and maintain for 3 months until roots are established.

Requests balance concrete lining for (L-60 m) for 15-acre cultivation. Recommend 1. To construct 300mm x300mm x100mm thick rectangular lining with sufficient earth filling for the reservation for 60m length. 2. To plant a single row of Areca nut seedling 1m spacing and gaps filled with Vetiver grass and maintain for 3 months until roots are established.

No proper canal is not available for 5-acre paddy fields (L-60 m). Recommend 1. To excavate 60m long canal manually. 2. To plant a single row of Areca nut seedling 1m spacing and gaps filled with Vetiver grass and maintain for 3 months until roots are established.

Requests balance concrete lining for (L-100 m). Recommend 1. Plant a single row of Areca nut seedling @ 1m spacing and gaps filled with Vetiver grass and maintain for 3 months until roots are established. 2. Earth filling to narrow tracks and depressions to form channel bund of 1.2- 1.5m wide and length about 100 m. 3. Protection by covering crops by cultivating edible varieties such as Mukunuwenna, Gotukola, and Thampala along the incline surface and vetiver grass edges.

Requests balance concrete lining for (L-80 m). Recommend 1. Plant a single row of Areca nut seedling @ 1m spacing and gaps filled with Vetiver grass and maintain for 3 months until roots are established. 2. Earth filling to narrow tracks and depressions to form channel bund of 1.2- 1.5m wide and length about 80 m. 3. Protection by covering crops by cultivating edible varieties such as Mukunuwenna, Gotukola, and Thampala along the incline surface and vetiver grass edges.

Requests balance concrete lining for (L-70 m). Recommend 1. Plant a single row of Areca nut seedling at 1m spacing and gaps filled with Vetiver grass and maintain for 3 months until roots are established. 2. Earth filling to narrow tracks and depressions to form channel bund of 1.2- 1.5m wide and length about 70 m. 3. Protection by covering crops by cultivating edible varieties such as Mukunuwenna, Gotukola, and Thampala along the incline surface and vetiver grass edges.
